Flow.description: Leaving a voice mail results in a new task being created.

value.stringValue: CASE( MOD( [Task].ActivityDate- DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, [Task].ActivityDate+2, /*if CloseDate is Sun,CloseDate+1=Monday */ 1, [Task].ActivityDate+2, /*if CloseDate is Mon,CloseDate+1=Tuesday */ 2, [Task].ActivityDate+2, /*if CloseDate is Tues,CloseDate+1=Wednesday */ 3, [Task].ActivityDate+2, /*if CloseDate is Wed,CloseDate+1=Thursday*/ 4, [Task].ActivityDate+4, /*if CloseDate is Thurs,CloseDate+1=Friday */ 5,[Task].ActivityDate+4, /*if CloseDate is Fri,CloseDate+3=Monday next week */ 6,[Task].ActivityDate+3, /*if CloseDate is Sat,CloseDate+2=Monday next week */ [Task].ActivityDate)

formulas.name: formula_6_myRule_5_A1_2165553038
formulas.expression: CASE( MOD( {!myVariable_current.ActivityDate}- DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, {!myVariable_current.ActivityDate}+2, /*if CloseDate is Sun,CloseDate+1=Monday */ 1, {!myVariable_current.ActivityDate}+2, /*if CloseDate is Mon,CloseDate+1=Tuesday */ 2, {!myVariable_current.ActivityDate}+2, /*if CloseDate is Tues,CloseDate+1=Wednesday */ 3, {!myVariable_current.ActivityDate}+2, /*if CloseDate is Wed,CloseDate+1=Thursday*/ 4, {!myVariable_current.ActivityDate}+4, /*if CloseDate is Thurs,CloseDate+1=Friday */ 5,{!myVariable_current.ActivityDate}+4, /*if CloseDate is Fri,CloseDate+3=Monday next week */ 6,{!myVariable_current.ActivityDate}+3, /*if CloseDate is Sat,CloseDate+2=Monday next week */ {!myVariable_current.ActivityDate})

Flow.label: PFG Voice Mail Task

value.stringValue: Left a voice mail. Will follow up within a two days.
